channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin surges and reclaims $60,000 level after shooting attack on Trump
item.description: Bitcoin, which trades around the clock, surged after former President Donald Trump was shot, potentially a reaction both to the perceived increased likelihood the Republican will win as well as to a more unstable political environment.

item.title: Photos show Trump with blood on his face after shots fired at rally
item.description: Trump was removed after loud cracking noises were heard while he was onstage at the Pennsylvania rally.

item.title: Dubai crown prince appointed UAE defense minister
item.description: The crown prince of Dubai has been appointed as minister of defense for the United Arab Emirates as part of a broader cabinet shuffle.

item.title: Hurry! Only 8 seats left at 75% off
item.description: GOOD MORNING! From February 16 ‚Äì April 4, 2024 I won 69 trades IN A ROW using the strategy I teach in the $2,000 Small Account Journey. That‚Äôs nearly 2-months without a loss in Journey. The tiny $2,000 balance, at its peak, hit $47,965 June 13 up 2,298%. Definitely not typical but pretty awesome, right?! [‚Ä¶]

item.title: My friend left his $500K life insurance to his sister. Before he died, his wife pleaded with him to leave it to their son. What now?
item.description: ‚ÄúTheir relationship was solid without any drama or suspicion.‚Äù

item.title: 'It's sick': Biden condemns violence after Trump injured in shooting at campaign rally
item.description: President Joe Biden, who is running for reelection against Trump, expressed gratitude that Trump is "safe and doing well."

item.title: Trump rally shooter ID'ed as Thomas Matthew Crooks by FBI: Live updates
item.description: Trump was rushed off stage at a Pennsylvania rally, and he stood up and punched his fist in the air for several seconds.

item.title: ‚ÄòShe lives in squalor‚Äô: My mother, 90, says I want to commit her to an ‚Äòinsane asylum‚Äô ‚Äî yet her doctor gave her a clean bill of health. What now?
item.description: ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs had an untreated abscessed tooth for over a year and she‚Äôs been scammed out of more than $5,000.‚Äù

item.title: Elon Musk endorses Donald Trump shortly after ex-president injured by shots fired at rally
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said he ‚Äúfully‚Äù endorses Trump after the former president was injured when shots were fired at a rally in Pennsylvania.

item.title: Institutions snapping up Chinese treasury bonds are shorting the economy, state media says
item.description: The report is the latest warning to the country's bond market after the People's Bank of China (PBOC) sounded concerns and introduced plans to sell treasury bonds to cool a bond rally.

item.title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôm not jealous ‚Äî just genuinely curious‚Äô: How can a woman work from home and mind her 3-year-old child at the same time?
item.description: ‚ÄúWhat do you all think about employees who work from home and have little kids to watch at the same time?‚Äù

item.title: Nikki Haley invited to speak at Republican convention in Milwaukee
item.description: Earlier this week an aide to the former Republican presidential candidate told NBC News that she had not yet received an invitation.

item.title: China, Russia navies conduct joint patrol in parts of Pacific, Chinese media says
item.description: Chinese and Russian naval fleets recently conducted their fourth joint sea patrol in the Western and Northern Pacific Ocean, Chinese state broadcaster CCTV reported on Sunday.

item.title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôve always been the responsible one‚Äô: My mother wants to leave her entire estate to me ‚Äî so I can take care of my younger brother. Is this foolish?
item.description: ‚ÄúWhat are the tax and financial implications of receiving an estate and then passing on a large percentage of it to someone else?‚Äù

item.title: Here are the Trump megadonors, VP hopefuls and celebrities headlining the Republican National Convention
item.description: Donald Trump will get the official 2024 Republican presidential nod at the RNC in Milwaukee.

item.title: Trump victory trades to swell after shooting, investors say
item.description: Saturday's shooting at U.S. former President Donald Trump's election rally raises his odds of winning back the White House, and trades betting on his victory will increase this coming week, investors said on Sunday.
